title: cryptomahmud
author: cryptomahmud
content: The Fermium Protocol, created for the user experience stuck between hundreds of DApps and new designs that are constantly difficult to adapt, aims to develop a communication network between DApp applications in the BSC network. It makes all DApp applications available within the Fermium DApp, which learns and operates through machine learning.Quick DApp AccessIt becomes possible to access dozens of different DApp applications from a single DApp application. It can be considered in line with the all-in-one concept. The wise man does first what the foolish man does last.Wallet and DApp SecurityWhile using DApp applications, you can see 100% reliable DApp applications and you can use your wallet with peace of mind. Thanks to the protected layer wallets, you only need to connect your wallet via Fermium DApp. It will help you to provide encrypted and reliable connection by creating a layer of protection for all DApp applications.Evolving EcosystemIt enhances the Fermium ecosystem by incorporating new DApp applications into machine learning to continually evolve.Importance of Fermium Protocol and DAppWe have combined dozens of DApps into a single DApp (All-in-one) to benefit consumers and DApp visitors.Your wallets are kept safe from all DApp apps!We do not allow unwanted financial payments!You can enter trading orders offline in the DApp!You can query the degree of trust in the DApp!You can do easy transactions between DApp applications!Fermium Protocol Token (MIUM/WBNB)Fermium Protocol has BEP20 Token based on Binance Smart Chain. The Fermium Protocol project, whose abbreviation can be found in the BSC network as MIUM, has a total of 200,000,000 MIUMs. Trading can be done from decentralized exchanges powered by the BSC network, such as PancakeSwap or Poocoin. Fees are deducted for 6% of the projects in purchase and sale transactions. Of the fees charged, 1% is charged for Automatic Liquidity, 3% for Marketing, and 2% for providing Charity.0xdedee9a5697140fc96130a4c5bca1f05bc154e14https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0xdedee9a5697140fc96130a4c5bca1f05bc154e14https://coinmarketcap.com/dexscan/bsc/0xc2217ecddb9b62b6d152f02e4a6a5b254fdb71edhttps://fermium.network

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: when will dapps be launched?I want to know how your dapps work, will they look the same as other daps or is there something different hereyou have passed the fairlaunch you need to add more Liquidity

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: I read the whitepaper, the ANN Thread, and didn't find anything more specific. What will be the use of the Fermium token (MIUM)?
